The Onra Host team is pleased to announce that we are now offering HDD KVM virtual servers, along with a new pricing model for them.

With our other virtual servers (SSD KVM, SSD Xen, and HDD Xen), we've been able to provide quite a bit of flexibility through a wide array of packages. However, we have learned that pre-defined packages don't work for everyone. Thus our server builder was born!

Our KVM HDD server builder can be found here: [http://www.onrahost.com/kvm-hdd](http://www.onrahost.com/kvm-hdd)

On that page, you can specify the number of CPUs, the amount of RAM, the size of the HDD, the amount of bandwidth, the number of IPs, and your desired operating system. Click "Order Now", fill out your information, and check out. Your VPS will be deployed within minutes of receiving payment.

Basic configuration for $5/month ($4.25/month with coupon listed below)
1 CPU Core @ 3.40GHz
128MB DDR3 RAM
25GB HDD Storage
250GB Bandwidth
1 IPv4 Address

Add additional resources for the following:
CPU CORES: $2 per core
RAM: $1 per 128MB
STORAGE: $2 per 25GB
BANDWIDTH: $1 per 250GB
IPv4 ADDRESSES: $2 per address

Configurations go as low as $5/month, however use coupon code **KVMHDDLET** to get 15% off for LIFE on any KVM HDD server purchased using the server builder.
